1.  Transfer 500 µL of serum into a 1.5 ml microfuge tube.
2. Add 125 µL of ExoQuick Exosome Precipitation Solution to the serum and
Centrifuge ExoQuick/serum mixture at 1,500 × g for 30 minutes at room temperature.
5. Spin down residual ExoQuick solution by centrifugation at 1,500 × g for 5 minutes at room temperature.
Move all traces of fluid by aspiration, taking great care not to disturb the pellet.
Pellet in 50 µL sterile PBS and
Proceed with RNA isolation using SeraMir Exosome RNA Purification Column Kit.
